titleStmt.title: The strange vvitch at Greenvvich, (ghost, spirit, or hobgoblin) haunting a wench, late servant to a miser, suspected a murtherer of his late vvife: with curious discussions of walking spirits and spectars of dead men departed, for rare and mysticall knowledge and discourse, / by Hieronymus Magomastix. April 24. 1650. Imprimatur. John Dovvname.
titleStmt.author: Hieronymus Magomastix.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Harper, and are to be sold by John Saywell, at the Greyhound in Little Britaine,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
